Reviews.Title: check part number
Reviews.Author: Jim Oakley
Reviews.Content: Anyone who has purchased or is going to purchase this laptop I advise you to look at the back of the laptop and check the part number. I have ordered 2 of these from amazon and both had a box with part number 7538 on it but when I took it out of the box the actual laptop was a cheaper 5537 model. The only way I discovered this was because I contaced dell due to an issue and they asked for the service tag number and told me it was a 5537.

Reviews.Title: Really nice laptop!
Reviews.Author: Jarran C.
Reviews.Content: I love the look,feel and touch of this little machine.It feels like a very sturdy built laptop and not like some that feels like cheap plastic. I am very happy with my purchase.I could do away with win8 but I can live with it. Only downside I have with it is the preinstalled mcafee antivirus program. Can't stand it.12/27/13Okay so after having it for more than 2 weeks I've come to the conclusion that this laptop is just grand.Start up without the ssd not being in it well not as quick but darn if I can tell the difference sometimes. As I said before not to keen on win8 but I'm still working out all of its functions , So only time will tell if I truly get it. Still this mighty little machine runs the programs I throw at it and laughs.Downside really seem minimal but I'd say the non existing back lighting on the key board would help if it had it. And I'm not to sure but the screen seems to look kind of fuzzy from time to time , But that may just my vision.Overall so far it is a really decent machine for the price, But could be even better if you find it on sale.Thank You for taking the time to read my  review. Still a 5 out of 5 rating from me.

Reviews.Title: I would buy again
Reviews.Author: Bob Dillard
Reviews.Content: I bought the non touch screen because of all the problems I read with the touch screen, also I use classic shell because I like the Windows 7 look and feel. This is a FAST computer with the i7 and 8 gigs of RAM. The Wi-Fi picks up very well, I have no problems with the touch pad, I can have 10 programs open and it's still fast. Good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: Good config for multimedia students
Reviews.Author: Ajantha
Reviews.Content: Been using this laptop for a week now and the config has been impressive. I am now able to use my laptop for all my multimedia purposes without any noise and heat being generated when running the apps.

Reviews.Title: it is good
Reviews.Author: vijay
Reviews.Content: It is good and working as expected.It's a very good experience with this laptop, If some more discount is there it would be good.

Reviews.Title: Computer is good but Windows 8 is terrible
Reviews.Author: Keith J. Rudes
Reviews.Content: The DELL computer is nice.  The battery gives quite a long operating time compared to my other laptop.  The only problem I have is learning Windows 8.  It appears that is was made as a toy not for business.  Microsoft messed up big time on this.  They had a good thing with XP but haven't really had a good operating system sense.  If they want to get back in the game they better come up with a system that favors business.

Reviews.Title: Working as expected so far for the family
Reviews.Author: Craig Winter
Reviews.Content: We purchased this as a family laptop and it's working as expected.It runs smoothly and quietly, and we've had no trouble thus far updating various software and settings.I feel we got value for the amount spent.

Reviews.Title: my rewiew dell laptop
Reviews.Author: Horacio Guerra
Reviews.Content: Well the laptop is very good and fast also like the design it's comfortable to write and work so i recommend buy this laptop

Reviews.Title: Nightmare on Dell Street
Reviews.Author: Sarah
Reviews.Content: Horrible Returns Dept, Horrible Tech SupportWe received the Inspiron 7000 series laptop in mid-December 2013. (It hasn't worked since I got it!!!)The Blue Screen of Death started immediately.We ran a diagnostic that showed a hard drive malfunction, ordered and received a new hard drive on January 6th, 2014.Continued Blue Screen of Death, but with new shaky then frozen screen feature!Re-seated the hard drive and connections, to no avail.Spent 3 hours on a Tech Support call on approx. January 13th, 2014.Continued Blue Screen of Death.Spent 1 hour on Tech Support call on approx. January 17th, 2014.I asked, "What if this doesn't work?" I was scolded by the Tech Support guy, and told, "It WILL work. This WILL fix your problem!!" And not told what would happen next.He told me that the OS is corrupt.I was told I would receive a disc to re-install my Windows OS. It's been over 8 days, no disc. Daily calls about a "technical malfunction in sending your hardware, there's a delay in shipping." (Whatever THAT means?!)I called Customer Service for a refund or exchange. They REFUSE, because it's been over 30 days since buying the broken machine..... OF COURSE IT'S BEEN OVER 30 DAYS! I've spent the whole time since I bought it doing repairs. It NEVER worked. The Customer Service Returns Dept Manager HUNG UP ON ME after lecturing me about the 30 day return policy.*****I will be reporting Dell to the Attorney General of my state. It's free legal enforcement of customer protections. All states have one, search the internet for your state's office. Sometimes you can report a violation online in only a few minutes! *****Second option, depending on how the AG handles things, may be to Dell for a violation of the Warranty of Merchantability and whatever else my attorney (we have one on retainer) can tack on. I'm a paralegal.  I didn't come to play.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron review
Reviews.Author: Ken Coradi
Reviews.Content: The computer is very fast, sturdy, yet light to carry.  Big screen which is nice.One thing I was disappointed with was that there is not a backlit keyboard.  I would have thought that this would be standard by now.  You have to have good light to use it.I also like the Windows 8 operating system that the Inspiron comes with.

Reviews.Title: Dell Computer
Reviews.Author: Noel Chong
Reviews.Content: This is a great price for the money for the best brand available.  Very compact and light. Thanks a lot

Reviews.Title: So Far, So Good
Reviews.Author: DV
Reviews.Content: I got this from Costco for $650 and a year of free security, but I have a 2 yr subscription to ESET NOD32, which I love and use on all our computers.  The price was great, as Costco had $150 off on this.  It was rather easy to setup and I haven't had the issues that I've read on other reviews.  My old laptop, which is 7.5 yrs old is a Sony Vaio and in it's day, it was great, though, it had heating issues.The Dell seems to not have the heating issues and as far as Windows 8, it is a lot different than the XP on my Vaio and than the Windows 7 on our other Dell laptop and a desktop we have.  We bought the touchscreen version and that just gives me another option and works well for some of the things I do.This system came with Windows 8 and after I did the 50 updates to this, I upgraded for free to Windows 8.1.  I really don't know what the difference was.  There are major differences from Windows XP and 8.  How the Start menu is completely different and I wished that I could arrange the START menu to all fit on one screen, but that's okay that it's horizontal.  It's more versatile and switching from a drop down type menu to icons is a bit different but not bad.We have an iPhone, so I got used to the touchscreen thing there and swiping.  To close down apps in Windows 8.1, you have to go from the top of the screen and swipe down to the bottom to close it.  For those other apps that have an X in the corner, you can close them down that way.How users are setup are a bit different, but it's fine.  Different isn't bad.  Though, if you don't have a hotmail account, I'm not sure how you would setup your stuff originally.  I do have to use my hotmail account to sign into my computer, which that is a pain if you don't have an account with hotmail.I didn't seem to have any issues with loading any of the programs that I regularly use.  And I had no problems installing Office 2007 Pro to it, which is what I use.  I was glad I did not have to upgrade my Office Suites.One of the things I would like to see is the ability to be able to condense the Apps page of Windows.  It's really cluttered and I don't like seeing all that clutter.  Maybe I just don't know how.It's really a nice little laptop, and I bought it primarily because my subcontracting job is requiring I upgrade to either Windows 7 or 8 Pro.  Next week I should get the Windows 8.1 Pro and I'll write a review of what happens there.  I hope I don't have to uninstall or reinstall all the programs I loaded today.Hope I continue to feel great about this little laptop, but so far, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Great value laptop !
Reviews.Author: Pietro Casano
Reviews.Content: I have had this laptop for less than a week but so far it is impressive.Processor is fast and reliable. Screen resolution is great, and battery is good. It is also easy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Poor performance
Reviews.Author: Harshal
Reviews.Content: Being high end configuration this laptop does not have that kind of performance. I have called dell technical support about the performance issue.Another issue with this laptop is its key board. The keys are very hard to type. Space bar does not work some times. You have to hit space bar twice or very hard. Touch screen some times does not work. I need to log off and log on to make it work.all n all not that worth to go for this model.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement computer
Reviews.Author: Sharon Gryzenia
Reviews.Content: I love the new Dell Inspiron.  It's fast, light and has a great sized screen.  Good resolution and we actually watched the Rose Bowl on it when our cable went out on New Years Day (thanks Xfinity!). I would highly recommend it- I just have to learn the new Windows operating system .

Reviews.Title: Awesome Laptop
Reviews.Author: Potty
Reviews.Content: Love my new toy all I have to do now is learn the new Windows 8  system. This Laptop is actually quick while surfing the net  and very light to carry around.

Reviews.Title: This laptop is superb !
Reviews.Author: m. pastor
Reviews.Content: I usually Don't purchase an item which is fairly pricey without going by the reviews. I do believe in reviews. But this particular one just came out in oct 2013.  Everything I needed is in this laptop especially the amount of memory. Weight and memory is my absolute priority.  I travel to asia a lot for business and pleasure. I just purchase it recently, January 2014. So far so good! One thing I need to mention,  I use goal zero solar kit that charges supposedly laptop. When I tested my dell it did not seem to work. I will be contacting dell soon re: this.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15R i15RM-7538sLV 15.6-Inch Laptop
Reviews.Author: Young
Reviews.Content: good computer  ...Dell Inspiron 15R i15RM-7538sLV 15.6-Inch Laptop  very happy to deal with it , hope next time the same

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: sassybadcat
Reviews.Content: Haven't had the laptop that long and the lettering is coming off the keys.  It freezes up and I thought it would be a little faster than my old laptop.  Very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Very frustrating
Reviews.Author: Randall
Reviews.Content: Moving around in Windows 8 makes me wonder what was wrong with XP, Vista or Windows 7.  Windows 8 should be benched.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 15R
Reviews.Author: kenny
Reviews.Content: Such a good computer. its a perfect laptop to do alot of things from gaming to photoshop. only thing is if your switching form windows 7 to 8 its a bit tricky

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop with good price
Reviews.Author: Nitin
Reviews.Content: I will recommend this laptop for the price and specification.It is best laptop for this price point go for it

Reviews.Title: A very good computer.
Reviews.Author: Daniel Santos Fernandes
Reviews.Content: I chose this rating because the computer is fast, has a good memory, and isn't heavy.One thing that I dislike is this computer hasn't touch screen.I would recommend to my parents.

Reviews.Title: Very good!
Reviews.Author: Talita Sander Pompeu
Reviews.Content: Very fast and efficient pc, too bad the HD is not ssd.I use it all the time, I run a lot of VMs on it and still has a great performance.

Reviews.Title: hugh issue that annoy me
Reviews.Author: alex
Reviews.Content: The amazon person that i talk to me was terrible?This is the second time i call. The first time was nice, quick, nice, and simple.  The second time took forever was annoying.pro: It look good with nice speccon:It freeze constantly like the pic i uploaded. the screen acted funny. sometime it goes to sleep really fast and i have to push the power button to turn on the pc or when i push the power button to wake it it power down.The model they send me was 5537 which sucks. It have only 1 star on the list of dell laptops.I will reorder it, in hope they sent me the right one. If they don't i will gave up on shopping with amazon and buy my pc for bestbuy or office deport.

Reviews.Title: Not having a good time
Reviews.Author: Jane
Reviews.Content: My old Dell is much more user friendly.  This one cost more, but with Windows 8, I cannot move around and switch easily between sites, keep my favorites on a bar, etc.  Messages keep popping up saying I can upgrade to Windows 8.1 for free if I go to the "store."  When I go to the "store" icon, there is no way to update to 8.1.  Anything should be an improvement on how to navigate around the Internet.  I gave it 3 stars because it is fast and good as long as I finally get onto the page I want.  I have what is probably an old version of Internet that works better than the one on the state page icons.  I'm writing this review on my old computer because I couldn't get to the Amazon site with the new Dell.  I'm on here to update my fantasy baseball team because I couldn't get to that page either, but went right to it on my old one.

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Lipika "Lipika s"
Reviews.Content: For the price this product is total waste of money. It is heavy. On the site this computer is described as lighter comparatively to Dells' other laptops. It is super slow even with i7 processor. I was expecting to be fast but it takes about 30-40 seconds to open a page . Window 8 changes your page while you are workign on it. It is very annoying.

Reviews.Title: how can you sell me a laptop with a charging problem?
Reviews.Author: wycliff gekonge
Reviews.Content: i was not impressed when I realized that my laptop is not charging properly.infact you sent an hp charger when it is a dell laptop.so bad

Reviews.Title: RAM gone Bad
Reviews.Author: Girish B R
Reviews.Content: In the Dell Laptop which I bought from amazon, the RAM memory has gone bad after using for only about a week. running around DELL service to get it replaced.

Reviews.Title: it is more than I expectated
Reviews.Author: LUCIANE DE AVILA BOTTON
Reviews.Content: Although it doesnt come with many programs or apps it Works very well. High speed  and not too heavy.I recommend it!

Reviews.Title: Quite a good machine
Reviews.Author: AJ
Reviews.Content: Love the processor and ram. It will handle just about anything I throw at it. There is not a ton of graphics power in this guy so there is the occasional hiccup when watching a video or doing editing. For the price though, I don't think you can beat it. I plan to throw in a hybrid drive which will probably speed things up even more.

Reviews.Title: Nice config, great price.
Reviews.Author: Amey G.
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop for educational purposes and am satisfied. The first model I got was creating some strange noise on idle state. But it was promptly replaced by Amazon and the new model works perfectly fine. If you want a hardcore gaming laptop, then this is not for you. Otherwise, it gives good performance at a great price.

Reviews.Title: good performance
Reviews.Author: Chengfei Jiang
Reviews.Content: Cemera not good no keyboard back light but good performance good for game and watching film it is a good computer

Reviews.Title: Good product good value
Reviews.Author: Ron Kincaid
Reviews.Content: It works fine and was what was promised, except that I expected it to have Windows 7.  I hate Windows 8 but am forcing myself to deal with it.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Raul Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a gift for my daughter , who is in college. She loves, its her first time using Windows 8.1 but she is a quick learner.

Reviews.Title: Great Laptop for the Price
Reviews.Author: Rob Reinhardt "Licensed Professional Counselo...
Reviews.Content: To be clear, I got this laptop for $100 less than the price I see at the time of this review so it made it an even greater bargain.  It's also important to note that this was a replacement for my seven year old laptop that was still running Vista.... so this laptop had a pretty easy time impressing me.  It boots quickly.  It opens programs quickly.  It runs beautifully, even when I have multiple programs open.  This is a work computer so I'm not expecting to run games, or stream videos on it, so it's doing everything I need it to do, and well.  It handled the upgrade to 8.1 Pro flawlessly (so I could have BitLocker among other things) and the keyboard is very responsive.  I wasn't sure about the full numeric keypad at first, thinking it would feel weird "typing to the left", but I adjusted to it quickly enough.My only gripes are1) I miss the lit keyboard I had on my previous Dell Inspiron2) The built quality on this one doesn't feel as solid as my previous one.  It feels more "delicate" in several ways.  There are also times that, if I place too much weight in certain areas with my hands or fingers, it impacts how the keyboard or track pad respond.3) The one thing I don't like about the numeric keypad is how it impacted the placement of the delete, page up/down, and End keys.  I used to be able to get to these without even looking.  Now it's a bit of a painOn a much more minor note, I also miss the custom cover my old laptop came with and was disappointed to see that Dell discontinued that.  The brushed, dark finish of this laptop is pretty nice, however.

Reviews.Title: Awesome laptop for an awesome price!
Reviews.Author: Austin Darbe
Reviews.Content: The shipping with Amazon Prime was extremely fast, and the condition was perfect! I was very excited to get it, and ever since, the laptop has been working to perfection! No complaints!

Reviews.Title: I like this laptop
Reviews.Author: Wilson Phillips
Reviews.Content: It does not have discrete graphics, but that was not something that I needed. I did add a Samsung SSD it is fast.

Reviews.Title: Returned it, Did Not Mention "Brushed Aluminum."
Reviews.Author: Charles Knowland
Reviews.Content: The ad for this model did not mention the now-popular "brushed aluminum" hand rest/surface that so many computers in a certain power range feature.  For many people this may sound bizarre, but for health reasons I do not want my hand resting against an aluminum alloy for 8 to 12 hours a day, since I use my laptops for work.  I do not want constant skin exposure to an aluminum product, and I'm surprised Dell and other companies would not be more conscious of this concern among a certain percentage of people.  I was very disappointed, because outside of that concern this computer was everything I wanted.  Had to return it for a different make and surface material.  Chose another model with a another company on Amazon and am grateful for Amazon's fair return policy.  All I did was open the box, saw the aluminum surface, and put it right back in the box and called for return authorization.  Amazon was great about it and I bought an Acer from them, which I'm very happy with.  It even cost $50 more, lol.  (And I got one with Windows 7...no 8 learning curve, which I was also thankful for).  "Sorry Dell"...re-think the aluminum surface, some people will not want it due to health concerns.  Of ALL metals, why did you have to choose that one; for some people, it's like choosing a mercury-based surface.

Reviews.Title: This is my first laptop
Reviews.Author: Piran Mohazzabi
Reviews.Content: This is my first laptop which I own. I had many desk top computer in thePast. I have this computer about a week so far I mam very happy withIt, it is very fast compare to  my five years old Windows Vista desk top computer. Also I had very good experience with Dell technical support.They help me remotely create recovery CD for my computer and remotely installed my Epson printer.

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: Sheri J. Davis
Reviews.Content: I really like the laptop.  The only thing that frustrates me is that the cuffs of my shirt can move the cursor to a different location on the screen but I think I can change the sensitivity of the pad to rectify that problem.

Reviews.Title: wrong item 5537 instead of 7538 HELP
Reviews.Author: Shana John "rashy"
Reviews.Content: l thought I was buying a 7538 but what I really received was a 5537. I spoke to a customer service  rep which return the item and said shipping will be refunded, the replacement item again was the same computer. The outside of the box is says 7538 but actual laptop is a 5537. Amazon customer service was speedy, but I learnt after they don't refund anything outside the US which it was shipping to Trinidad. They did refund my shipment thou, 4 stars for good service. the item has the same spec as the 7538 so I will like to know if is one and the same. HELP. It is working good so far, I will not waste time 2 return again makes no sense.

Reviews.Title: I HATE Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Carlene D. Bonner
Reviews.Content: This laptop came with windows 8 and it has taken me quite awhile to work through all the annoying features.  It is significantly different than Windows 7, which I would be thrilled to have back.  Now that I have googled all the things I needed to shut down on the operating system, I like it better, but what a hassle.  I considered sending it back, but once I had all my files and programs loaded on it I didn't want to go through that hassle again.  So, I'm keeping it, somewhat reluctantly, just because of the operating system.  In terms of the hardware, I would give it 5 stars, but the operating system ruins it.

Reviews.Title: Dell Computer
Reviews.Author: Claricei "the Truthseeker"
Reviews.Content: Do not like the Windows 8 platform.  I should have purchased one with Win 7 or other. Some things are still not figured out for total usage

Reviews.Title: Good Choice for the price!
Reviews.Author: Fausto Andres Acosta "FAACOSTA"
Reviews.Content: The laptop is fast.A lot of memory.Never get hot.The size and the screen resolution are adequate for normal use.The battery duration is amazing.  It's a good choice to select fourth generation processor.I recommend to upgrade to Windows 8.1.

Reviews.Title: Dell/Amazon PC
Reviews.Author: Michael G. Smith "mgs1950"
Reviews.Content: The laptop itself seems fast enough, but the tag on the pc shows a different model number than the one advertised. I would give this one a much higher rating, except for what seems to be an obvious deception.

Reviews.Title: slow.
Reviews.Author: j. lacoss
Reviews.Content: this is the slowest laptop that I've ever had and I've yet to even put anything on it.  it is also the most expensive one and the first dell.  dell is now off of the list.  I seriously recommend that you keep shopping.  hopefully I can repair my asus and give this piece of crap away.  incredibly disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Dell laptop
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Jaeger
Reviews.Content: Great laptop for me!  Light, long battery life, easy to use.  Best choice I could have made for my retirement use.

Reviews.Title: Inspiron Laptop
Reviews.Author: Teresa Sullivan
Reviews.Content: Great computer. I was hesitant that it was loaded with Windows 8, but those "fears" were unfounded. The computer is fast and easy to work with. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Not a good fit for a business user
Reviews.Author: Steve E Hambric
Reviews.Content: I have been extremely unhappy with this laptop.  I've had it for a few months and already considering investing in a new machine so I can dump my Dell.- Consistently get the blue screen of death, support has been unable to identify and resolve the issue- Initial settings were very annoying, for example the PC would automatically reboot to install minor updates.  Disrupting me at work and sometimes taking me offline for 30 minutes or more during critical work moments- Dell software is constantly trying to sell me redundant virus protection - my computer isn't your billboard, quit disrupting my business presentations with pop-up notifications trying to sell me things I don't need- Difficulty connecting to networks I know are available and in good working order- Forced to buy Windows 8, which is not appropriate for business usersMy friends that know computers strongly cautioned me against a Dell.  The price was great so I took a gamble.  I figured I only use Office and a browser...basic enough needs that any computer should be able to handle.  I was wrong, recommend you go with a different brand.

Reviews.Title: Hopeless
Reviews.Author: aneesh
Reviews.Content: The computer is hopeless. Don't buy it. It dies down every now and then and I have to restart it. No touch screen and therefore Windows 8 Mobile Interface on the laptop is very bad.

Reviews.Title: Instruction to navigate thru computer????
Reviews.Author: Frank
Reviews.Content: I bought a Dell Inspiron 15R i5RM - 7538sLV 15.6inch laptop and it arrived with a Quick Start Guide but it is in Spanish I need English instructions to navigate and get acquainted with my laptop?? Help!!
